name: Amy Field
text: First visit - but will definitely not be my last! Pizza was fresh, hot, and extremely flavorful...had a melody of several things - pizza (supreme and chicken bacon ranch), calzone, wings - all were awesome and did not disappoint! Will definitely be back - last but not least...the customer service was second to none üëçüèº

name: Layna Dixon
text: The buffet is back and better than ever! Squeaky clean, great options, and friendly atmosphere for our family. Reminds us of our favorite pizza place back home.

name: Mike Parker
text: Love this place! My wife is super picky about her ranch and their ranch is amazing. The July 17.76 special for a large pepperoni and a regular calzone is amazing. Plenty of food, extremely delicious, friendly workers AND a drive through? Yeah it's amazing

name: Michael Wharton
text: The best pizza and calzones in Pea Ridge. The young woman who took my order and ran the pickup window gets an easy 5 stars. The 3 stars is for the feller who took my call to add to my order but only got the charge right but forgot to fix ‚Ä¶More

name: Sherry Roddey
text: Very pricey. Their website wasn't up to date, pricing wasn't accurate.

name: William Bintliff
text: Great pizza made the way you want it.

name: Paul Whitlock
text: Hit this pizza place for the first time, really great! Decent price, delicious pizza, very nice people. The only thing holding me from 5 stars was that it took a really long time for our food, like 40 mins! We were hungry but not in a hurry luckily. Pizza was not greasy at all and crust was so good we ate it! Definitely going here again

name: Martha Mckinney
text: Pretty good..not great but good.  No specials :(

name: Vicky Tallman
text: Tried this place since another favorite closed down.  I was pleasantly surprised.  The pizza was good, and the prices were reasonable.  They also have a buffet, which is very nice as pizza and salad go well together.

name: Jasmine Bailey
text: Good Pizza. Went during their lunch buffet with my family. 3 stars for the small selection of pizzas ( guaranteed it is a smaller place) but nothing just super delicious. I did like their salad bar with the topping and that the buffet ‚Ä¶More

name: Michelle Salsbury
text: Tried this place for the first time.  Excellent calzone! Very large, so don't over order like I did.  People were very friendly, but it did take quite a bit longer than they told me for a to go order.  Even given that, I would rate 5 stars! I will definitely eat here again and recommend to others based on quality.  Just be patient.

name: Cassey Henson
text: Best Pizza ever! And salad bar! My whole family loves Simple Simon's and Roger the Owner is super nice and accommodating. Always have great service and feel welcome.

name: Lisa Abraham
text: Always very good and tasty.

name: Janet Cores
text: Just moved to Pea Ridge and tried this place out during Tuesday Buffet, the staff was the most friendly I‚Äôve experienced. Every single one of the ladies and the gentleman made sure we had everything we needed and kept bringing pizza out. ‚Ä¶More

text: Great pizza place and very nice staff.

text: Grew up eating Simple Simons I‚Äôm so happy to see it coming back and it‚Äôs taste the same. Great food and great employees. Guy working there is very nice üëçüèº will always pick this over any other pizza

name: Steven Hyde
text: Very greasy. Ordered a pepperoni with extra cheese. Had to literally pour the grease off before we could eat it. Buy a better quality pepperoni and this will improve. Your prices are high enough that I should have had the best quality ‚Ä¶More

name: Angie Anderson
text: I really appreciate y'all being the first to make a keto pizza. The pizza I got tonight was just greasy melted cheese. It didn't have any flavor at all. I wanted pizza. I can melt cheese at home. You need to offer a fathead crust or even a ‚Ä¶More

text: Good pizza; great service! Very friendly staff and average prices. Will try calzones next time; they look scrumptious!

name: Hannah Jennings

name: Cassie Leach
text: Everything on the salad bar was fresh. The vegetables tasted garden fresh. Bacon Chicken Ranch Calzone was awesome and a great proportion. I had a chocolate chip cookie dough shake that was also awesome. The staff was friendly and the owner ‚Ä¶More
